Actions.Name: Append file
Actions.Description: This operation appends data to a file.

Actions.Name: Copy file
Actions.Description: This operation copies a file to a file system.

Actions.Name: Create file
Actions.Description: This operation creates a file. If the file already exists, the existing content is replaced.

Actions.Name: Extract archive to folder
Actions.Description: This operation extracts an archive file into a folder (example: .zip).

Actions.Name: Get file content
Actions.Description: This operation gets the content of a file.

Actions.Name: Get file content using path
Actions.Description: This operation gets the content of a file using the path.

Actions.Name: Get file metadata
Actions.Description: This operation gets the metadata for a file.

Actions.Name: Get file metadata using path
Actions.Description: This operation gets the metadata of a file using the path.

Actions.Name: List files in folder
Actions.Description: This operation gets the list of files and subfolders in a folder.

Actions.Name: List files in root folder
Actions.Description: This operation gets the list of files and subfolders in the root folder.

Actions.Name: When a file is created (properties only)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when one or more files are created in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

Actions.Name: When a file is added or modified (properties only)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when one or more files are added or modified in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.
